valid_email_format:
The email address must be in a valid format.
Example: example@email.com
password_requirements:
8 to 24 characters.
Must include uppercase and lowercase letters, a number and a special character.
Allowed special characters: ! @ # $ %
password_must_match: Must match the first password field.

unauthorized_message: You do not have access to the requested page.

Header.title: Learn English Effortlessly
Header.paragraph: Master English through interactive lessons, quizzes, and exercises designed for learners of all levels.

About.paragraph: Our mission is to make English learning accessible and engaging for everyone. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, we have the resources you need to succeed.

Why.progressTracking: Progress tracking to achieve your goals

Services.text1: Learn English grammar rules with clear explanations and examples tailored for every level.
Services.text2: Improve your speaking skills through interactive exercises and feedback from native speakers.
Services.text3: Practice listening with real-world conversations and audio recordings.
Services.text4: Develop your writing skills through guided exercises and detailed feedback.
Services.text5: Test your knowledge and challenge yourself with fun, interactive quizzes.
Services.text6: Join a community of learners and share your progress while helping each other.

Testimonials.text1: "This app helped me achieve fluency in just six months! The lessons are so engaging and easy to follow."
Testimonials.text2: "I love the speaking exercises. Practicing with native tutors has improved my confidence greatly."
Testimonials.text3: "The quizzes are so much fun! I can track my progress and see how much I've learned."

Contact.address: 97 Man Thien, Hiep Phu, Thu Duc city, HCMC

Features.text1: Complete courses and receive certificates to showcase your skills.
Features.text2: Monitor your learning journey and celebrate milestones.
Features.text3: Access lessons and practice anywhere, anytime on your mobile device.
Features.text4: Engage in fun challenges and connect with a supportive community.

quote1: Nothing is more precious than independence and freedom.
quote2: What we are, the world is.
quote3: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
quote4: You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us. And the world will live as one.
quote5: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
quote6: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quote7: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quote8: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people's thinking.
quote9: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quote10: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
